attributes.action: Give ALL UK citizens living abroad the right to vote in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Many of us would have voted to stay in the EU in the Brexit elections and feel that the decision was undemocratic as it did not consider our voice.
attributes.background: We are forgotten citizens, in  limbo, neither able to vote in our country of residence nor in the UK. This is undemocratic.

rejection.details:
The Government has said that it does have plans to change this rule. It's therefore not clear what action you would like the Government to take that is different from what it is already doing.

You can find more information in the Government's response to this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112142
